content:
Hi,
I just checked my 6.100A pset 4 score and I received a 60%, I was confused why my grade was so low, so I checked the autograder tests. Apparently, my code was "killed because it took too long to run", despite only running for 0.2 seconds over the 4 second allowance (which was not mentioned in the pset guide). My code was not inefficient so I'm not sure why I lost marks for this.
Please let me know if this can be fixed.
Kerb: hcs
ID# 954106693
subject: Pset wrongly graded by Autograder

content: We plan on manually grading all submissions that went over the 4 second time limit on the server.
